cast.overview: Things get chaotic when the gang leader falls madly in love with her. Will she be successful with her mission?
cast.title: Boso Dos

cast.overview: A nurse is assigned to work at an island called Isla Bato, where men treat women with lust. As she experiences the people's madness, she plans a way to get out of the island.
cast.title: Island of Desire

cast.overview: A photographer is tasked to take a photo of a rare flower thriving in the mountain, but he discovers women trapped in a hidden brothel for illegal loggers.
cast.title: Virgin Forest

cast.overview: She gets entangled with three men who want her: her suitor, her ex-boyfriend and her boss. But there's another one who wants to control and turn her into a sex monster.
cast.title: Ang Babaeng Nawawala sa Sarili

cast.overview: Janice's steamy obsession to imitate Lexi propels them to campus stardom. But dark secrets blur the lines between authenticity and seductive deception.
cast.title: Bedspacer

cast.overview: The married life of Sabel and Brian was cut short when three men rape her and kill Brian in their honeymoon. Surviving from the crime, she vows to let the culprits experience hell.
cast.title: Sabel Is Still Young

cast.overview: Despite warnings from friends and his reputation as a womanizer, heartbroken car sales agent Gina pursues a relationship with new colleague Red. Has he changed? Or are his sweet gestures and their hot nights together clouding her from seeing what he truly is – a red flag?
cast.title: Red Flag

cast.overview: Set in the late 90s, a story of love, hatred, and jealousy unfolds when a stranger suddenly enters the lives of three sisters.
cast.title: Panibugho

cast.overview: Two college schoolmates venture into the world of cybersex to support their needs. They fulfill their fans' sexual fantasy only to realized that they too, are falling for each other.
cast.title: Kaulayaw

cast.overview: Delves into the intricate web of a secretive cult, where deception lurks beneath the surface, love is tested and sacrifices are made set against the backdrop of a mysterious and secluded community, the film follows the journey of its leaders and blind followers as they navigate through love, loyalty and the haunting allure of the unknown.
cast.title: Sagrada Luna

cast.overview: In a province where most housewives are deprived of intimacy by their busy husbands, a new savings cooperative is introduced by a merchant. The salary to claim: cash or a night with a mysterious man. The women surely know what to choose.
cast.title: Paluwagan

cast.overview: Robin, a young student, is obsessed with Tanya, his teacher. He then sees Tanya kissing a female student, so he blackmails her. When Robin believes that he is in control, he learns Tanya's dark personality.
cast.title: Teacher's Pet

cast.overview: A movie about sisters who use their bodies to survive. To support her family, Jasmine becomes a sugar baby to a businessman. She regrets her choice as she learns that that it would put her and her sister's life in danger.
cast.title: Sponsor

cast.overview: A successful manager finds herself drawn to her innocent young employee. What begins as attraction soon evolves into a complicated relationship, where passion and desire blur professional boundaries and awaken unexpected emotions between them.
cast.title: Rapsa

cast.overview: Ilyana, determined to follow her dream of becoming a boatwoman despite her father’s disapproval, begins guiding vlogger Levi on his travels. What starts as a pursuit of ambition soon stirs unexpected emotions, as their journey together drifts into deeper, uncharted waters.
cast.title: Bangkera

cast.overview: Hosted by Micaella Raz and Zsara Laxamana. Your favorite VMX crushes kiss, lick, and tease each other in the sexiest girl-on-girl scenes ever caught on camera. Every touch is electric. Every moan, real.
cast.title: Kiss/Kiss

cast.overview: At Sipsipan, a shady stop where truckers trade fuel for cash and pleasure, one man’s craving leads him down a path of lust, lies, and no return.
cast.title: Sipsipan

cast.overview: Cheska, a talented wedding planner, is unexpectedly reunited with her former lover Arnie when she takes on a new client, bride-to-be Celine. Seizing the opportunity, Cheska sets in motion a carefully crafted plan for revenge, intertwining passion, deception, and unresolved emotions in this sultry drama.
cast.title: Unli Pop

cast.overview: It tells the story of Maria, a young woman who appears only during the full moon. She falls for a man named Danilo, and their love is tested through time, because for Danilo, decades have passed, but for Maria, it has only been a few moments.
cast.title: The Secret of Maria Makinang
